result.execSummary:
Khristian Jovanny Arreguin was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Khristian Jovanny Arreguin was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Khristian Jovanny Arreguin

defendant.name: Arreguin, Khristian Jovanny

records.addlTxt:
8:47 AM Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in court with attorney Shelley Cupino. Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in custody at SCDC.  Joel N Urmanski appeared for the Wisconsin, State of.
Defendant waives right to an Extradition hearing. Defense reviewed waiver w/deft. All parties sign the Waiver of Extradition form.
Extradition hearing on February 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

01:38 PM Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in court with attorney Shelley Cupino by phone.  Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in custody.  Joel N Urmanski appeared in person for the Wisconsin, State of.
 Atty Cupino spoke to her client and he is willing to waive extradition. The State will have paperwork ready for all parties to sign on 2.23.22.
(case re-noticed to an in-person hearing on 2/23/22)  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Status conference on February 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Extradition hearing on February 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:14 AM Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in court with attorney Patricia Ann Adelman. Attorney Patricia Ann Adelman appeared by phone. Defendant Khristian Jovanny Arreguin in custody.  Joel N Urmanski appeared for the Wisconsin, State of.  Khristian Jovanny Arreguin appeared by video means with Attorney. Defendant advised of rights. Received complaint/waived reading. Probable cause found in the complaint. Bond set.  Status conference scheduled for February 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
